title: Last Love
lyrics:
Lyric 015B - 마지막 사랑 (Last Love)

[Romanization]

neol mannamyeonseobuteo
naneun kkaedaratji
nae majimak sarangiran geol
apeun ibyeoreun
ama uri ape eopseul geoya
eoryeopge urineun mannatjana

anggae geueukhan badatga barabomyeo
neomaneul wihan uijareul jumbihago
mureup kkulgo jangmireul seommulhal ge
naege gidaeeo amu mal haji malgo swieojwo
nan eonjena gyeote isseuni
neomaneul saranghae

I'll be with you now
Always right by your side
neon pyeonanhi nae pume jamdeulmyeon dwae
I will sing for you
This love is just for you

Don't you worry now
'bout what lies ahead
neoreul wihae mueosideun hagesseo
You can be a queen
In the scent of moonlight
salmyeon dwae

orae itgo saratji
yejeon jageun gippeum
gidarim kkeute neol mannatji
seulpeun ibyeoreun
ije saenggakhago sipji ana
eoryeopge urineun mannatjana

haepbit gadeukhan achimen
jameseo kkaen neomaneul wihan siksa jumbihago
salmyeosi neoui gwie soksagilge
malgeun narimyeon dulmanui gangajireul derigo
jageun gongwon geotgo sipeo
neomaneul saranghae

I'll be with you now
Always right by your side
neon pyeonanhi nae pume jamdeulmyeon dwae
I will sing for you
This love is just for you

Don't you worry now
'bout what lies ahead
neoreul wihae mueosideun hagesseo
You can be a queen
In the scent of moonlight
salmyeon dwae

I'll be with you now
Always right by your side
neon pyeonanhi nae pume jamdeulmyeon dwae
I will sing for you
This love is just for you

Don't you worry now
'bout what lies ahead
neoreul wihae mueosideun hagesseo
You can be a queen
In the scent of moonlight

I'll be with you now
Always right by your side

[Hangeul]

널 만나면서부터

나는 깨달았지

내 마지막 사랑이란 걸

아픈 이별은

아마 우리 앞에 없을 거야

어렵게 우리는 만났잖아



안개 그윽한 바닷가 바라보며

너만을 위한 의자를 준비하고

무릎 꿇고 장미를 선물할 게

내게 기대어 아무 말 하지 말고 쉬어줘

난 언제나 곁에 있으니

너만을 사랑해



I'll be with you now

Always right by your side

넌 편안히 내 품에 잠들면 돼

I will sing for you

This love is just for you



Don't you worry now

'bout what lies ahead

너를 위해 무엇이든 하겠어

You can be a queen

In the scent of moonlight

살면 돼



오래 잊고 살았지

예전 작은 기쁨

기다림 끝에 널 만났지

슬픈 이별은

이제 생각하고 싶지 않아

어렵게 우리는 만났잖아



햇빛 가득한 아침엔

잠에서 깬 너만을 위한 식사 준비하고

살며시 너의 귀에 속삭일게

맑은 날이면 둘만의 강아지를 데리고

작은 공원 걷고 싶어

너만을 사랑해



I'll be with you now

Always right by your side

넌 편안히 내 품에 잠들면 돼

I will sing for you

This love is just for you



Don't you worry now

'bout what lies ahead

너를 위해 무엇이든 하겠어

You can be a queen

In the scent of moonlight

살면 돼



I'll be with you now

Always right by your side

넌 편안히 내 품에 잠들면 돼

I will sing for you

This love is just for you



Don't you worry now

'bout what lies ahead

너를 위해 무엇이든 하겠어

You can be a queen

In the scent of moonlight



I'll be with you now

Always right by your side
name: 015B - 마지막 사랑 (Last Love)
